objective: I need to complete the list of tasks
task: Eu preciso saber somenta a descrição de todos os afazeres com a prioridade média
thoughts: To get the description of all tasks with medium priority, I need to retrieve the 'description' field from the 'ToDo' doctype.
I can use the 'erpnext_get_records_list' tool to fetch all the 'ToDo' records.
I will filter the records based on the 'priority' field, where the value is 'Medium'.
For each record, I will extract the 'description' field and store it in a list.
Finally, I will return the list of descriptions.
